MessageReviewHandler.description: Configuration information for optional review of messages.

properties.name: FallbackResult
properties.description: Specifies the fallback behavior if the handler does not return a valid response, encounters an error, or times out.

type.description: Specifies the fallback behavior if the handler does not return a valid response, encounters an error, or times out.

properties.name: Uri
properties.description: Identifier of the message review handler.

type.description: Identifier of the message review handler.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: LoggingConfigurationIdentifiers
properties.description: Array of logging configuration identifiers attached to the room.

type.description: Array of logging configuration identifiers attached to the room.

properties.name: MaximumMessageLength
properties.description: The maximum number of characters in a single message.

type.description: The maximum number of characters in a single message.

properties.name: MaximumMessageRatePerSecond
properties.description: The maximum number of messages per second that can be sent to the room.

type.description: The maximum number of messages per second that can be sent to the room.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the room. The value does not need to be unique.

type.description: The name of the room. The value does not need to be unique.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Room ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

type.description: Room ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The system-generated ID of the room.

type.description: The system-generated ID of the room.
